name: CatKing
description: Introducing CatKing, a new cryptocurrency built on the Arbitrum One blockchain. As the popularity of Doge memes continues to rise, we've noticed that many talented cat meme creators are struggling to receive fair compensation for their work. With many existing meme services taking a significant cut of profits, aspiring cat meme artists are often left feeling discouraged and undervalued. At CatKing, we aim to change this by providing a more equitable platform for creators to share and profit from their work. As the future of the music industry continues to evolve, we believe that the meme economy will follow suit. By building a community around CatKing, we're creating a space for cat meme artists to showcase their talents and receive fair compensation for their work.
